trait.name: Constructed Resilience
entries: The {@i Combat Optimized Martial Personnel And Survival Savant} has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned} and is immune to disease. Magic can't put them to sleep.

trait.name: Natural Explorer
entries: When the C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit makes an Intelligence or Wisdom check related to Grasslands, the C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit's proficiency bonus is doubled.

trait.name: Umbral Sight
entries: While in darkness, the C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit is {@condition invisible} to any creatures that rely on darkvision to see them in that darkness.

trait.name: Dread Ambusher
entries: The C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit has a +1 bonus to initiative. For the first turn of each combat the C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit's walking speed increases by 10ft, they can make an additional weapon attack and that attack does an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). THE C.O.M.P.A.S.S. Unit has the following ranger spells prepared:

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Constructed Resilience
entries: The {@i Combat Unit Designated as Guardian and Emperor's Legionary} has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned} and is immune to disease. Magic can't put them to sleep.

trait.name: Improved Critical
entries: The C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit can take one additional action on their turn.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The C.U.D.G.E.L. Unit can use a bonus action to regain 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) HP.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw, rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@i Hit:} 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 1} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}3 (1d8 - 1) piercing damage.

trait.name: Constructed Resilience
entries: The {@i Surgical Combat Automated Logistics Personal Executable Liason} Unit has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned} and is immune to disease. Magic can't put them to sleep.

trait.name: Blessed Healer
entries: When the S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit casts a healing another creature, they regain HP equal to 2 + the spell’s level.

trait.name: Disciple of Life
entries: Whenever S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit uses a healing spell, the creature regains additional HP equal to 2 + the spell’s level.

trait.name: Divine Strike (1/Turn)
entries: When S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can deal an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Mace, +1
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Channel Divinity (2/Short Rest))
entries: The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit uses their Channel Divinity in one of the following ways.

items.name: {@b Preserve Life}
items.entry: : The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit restores 65 HP spread among any creatures within 30 ft. of them. Creatures cannot be healed past half of its hit point maximum.

items: {@b Turn Undead}: Each undead within 30 feet of the S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A turned creature spends its turns moving as far away from the S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit as it can, can’t willingly move to a space within 30 feet of the S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit, take reactions, and only take the dash action, escape from an effect that prevents it from moving, or take the Dodge action if there’s nowhere to move.

trait.name: Constructed Resilience
entries: The {@i Surgical Combat Automated Logistics Personal Executable Liason} has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned} and is immune to disease. Magic can't put them to sleep.

trait.name: Blessed Healer
entries: When the S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit casts a healing another creature, they regain HP equal to 2 + the spell’s level.

trait.name: Disciple of Life
entries: Whenever the S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit uses a healing spell, the creature regains additional HP equal to 2 + the spell’s level.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit has the following cleric spells prepared:

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Channel Divinity (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit uses their Channel Divinity in one of the following ways.

items.name: {@b Preserve Life}
items.entry: : The S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit restores 65 HP spread among any creatures within 30 ft. of them. Creatures cannot be healed past half of its hit point maximum.

items: {@b Turn Undead}: Each undead within 30 feet of the S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A turned creature spends its turns moving as far away from the S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit as it can, can’t willingly move to a space within 30 feet of the S.C.A.L.P.E.L. Unit, take reactions, and only take the dash action, escape from an effect that prevents it from moving, or take the Dodge action if there’s nowhere to move.
